Strength: 6 (-2) Dexterity: 15 (2) Constitution: 12 (1) Intelligence: 13 (1) Wisdom: 7 (-2) Charisma: 11 (0)
Background: Hermit Alignment: Neutral Evil Deity: The Lord Of The Hells (LE)
Experience: 589587/1000000 Level: 20 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 90/180
Ability Notes:

Feature Notes:

Discovery: Knows a unique and powerful truth
Keen Mind: Always knows the direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset/Can recall anything seen or heard during the past month

Combat
Hit Points: 99 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Handaxe (+4 1d6-2 R20/60); Javelin (+4 1d6-2 R30/120); Unarmed (+4 1-2)
Combat Notes:
Bonus Proficiencies (Blood Domain): Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: -2
Strength Damage Adjustment: -2
Destroy Undead: Turning destroys undead up to CR 4
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Turn Undead: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make undead flee (save DC 12 Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Vascular Corruption Aura: R30' Foes suffer 2d6 HP necrotic and half healing for 1 min once per long rest
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 6; Constitution: 1; Dexterity: 2; Intelligence: 1; Strength: -2; Wisdom: 4
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 5; C1: 4; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 3; C6: 2; C7: 2; C8: 1; C9: 1 Attack: C: 4 Spell DC: C: 12
Spells:
Aid (C2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 hit points for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Blade Barrier (C6 Evoc): R90' Creates a 100'x20'x5' blade wall or a 60'x20'x5' blade ring that provides 3/4 cover and inflicts 6d10 HP slashing (save Dexterity half) for concentration up to 10 min
Bless (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Blight (C4 [Blood Domain] Necr): R30' Inflicts 8d8 HP necrotic (save Constitution half; plant target has disadvantage on the save and suffers maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Clairvoyance (C3 Divi): R1 mile Self can see or hear through an invisible sensor for concentration up to 10 min
Contagion (C5 Necr): Touched suffers poisoned (save Constitution each turn; 3 successes ends, and 3 failures inflict a choice of disease for 7 days)
Crown Of Madness (C2 [Blood Domain] Ench): R120' Self can direct the target's attacks each rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Daylight (C3 Evoc): R60' Target centers a 60' radius bright light for 1 hr
Death Ward (C4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Detect Evil And Good (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for concentration up to 10 min
Divination (C4 Divi): Answers a question about an event up to 7 days in the future; additional uses before a long rest add a 25% chance of failure [R]
Dominate Person (C5 [Blood Domain] Ench): R60' Target humanoid obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 6, 7, or 8]
Forbiddance (C6 Abju): Touched 40000 sq ft bars teleport and portals; entry inflicts 5d10 HP of a choice of radiant or necrotic to one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 day; casting daily for 30 days makes the effects permanent [R]
Geas (C5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Haste (C3 [Blood Domain] Tran): R30' Willing target gains double Speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dexterity, and an additional action for concentration up to 1 min and suffers 1 rd of lethargy afterward
Hold Monster (C5 [Blood Domain] Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Holy Aura (C8 Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain advantage on saves, inflict disadvantage on attackers, and blind successful fiend and undead melee attackers (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Locate Object (C2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Plane Shift (C7 Conj): Target (save Charisma negates) or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane
Prayer Of Healing (C2 Evoc): R30' 6 targets regain 2d8-2 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 hit points]
Protection From Evil And Good (C1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and advantage on saves vs. existing conditions for concentration up to 10 min; those creatures also suffer disadvantage on attacks on the target
Raise Dead (C5 Necr): Restores life with 1 hit point to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Ray Of Enfeeblement (C2 [Blood Domain] Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts half damage with Strength weapons (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Ray Of Sickness (C1 [Blood Domain] Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Sanctuary (C1 Abju): R30' Foes of the target cannot attack it (save Wisdom negates) for 1 min; target attacking ends
Sending (C3 Evoc): Self can exchange 25-word messages with a familiar target
Sleep (C1 [Blood Domain] Ench): R90' 20' radius puts to sleep 5d8 hit points of creatures, starting with those with the least hit points, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 hit points of creatures]
Slow (C3 [Blood Domain] Tran): R120' 6 targets in a 40' cube suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dexterity saves, loss of reactions, and no more than 1 action per rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched dying creature becomes stable
Stone Shape (C4 Tran): Reshapes touched 5' cube of stone
Stoneskin (C4 [Blood Domain] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Symbol (C7 Abju): Inscribes a touch object with a permanent glyph that, when triggered, inflicts a choice of harmful magic effect—10d10 HP necrotic (save Constitution half), arguing for 1 min (save Constitution negates), frightened and fleeing for 1 min (save Wisdom negates), overwhelmed with despair for 1 min (save Charisma negates), insane for 1 min (save Intelligence negates), incapacitated by pain for 1 min (save Constitution negates), asleep for 10 min or until shaken or harmed (save Wisdom negates), or stunned for 1 min (save Wisdom negates)
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
True Resurrection (C9 Necr): Restores life and full hit points to and removes all diseases, poisons, wounds, and curses from a willing touched or named 200-year-old corpse
Magic Notes:
Blood Puppet: R60' Can use Channel Divinity to force a Huge target to move at half speed and attack (save Constitution negates)
Bloodletting Focus: Harming spells inflict +(spell level + 2) HP necrotic
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 3 times per short rest
Crimson Bond: Can use Channel Divinity with the week-old blood of a target to learn its distance, direction, hit points, and conditions for concentration up to 1 hr; can suffer 2d6 HP necrotic to share the target's sight or hearing for 1 rd (save Constitution ends)
Divine Intervention: Has a 100% chance to gain help from The Lord Of The Hells once per week
Sanguine Recall: Can suffer up to 10d6 HP to recover an equal number of spell slot levels (level 5 maximum) once per long rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
War Caster: Has advantage on concentration saves to maintain a spell/Can cast when holding a shield or a weapon/Can use a reaction to cast as an opportunity attack in response to movement
